attributes.name: Geo Point Field
attributes.summary:
The Geo Point Field is a powerful component that enables you to capture, store, and display geographical coordinates in your application. Perfect for location-based features, mapping applications, and any scenario where you need to work with latitude and longitude data.

Key Features
- Coordinate Storage: Store precise latitude and longitude values with decimal precision.
- Interactive Map Integration: Visualize coordinates on an interactive map with click-to-set functionality.
- Real-time Updates: Coordinates update instantly when modified through the map interface.

Display Options
- Text Format: Display coordinates as simple text (e.g., "37.7749, -122.4194").
- Map Format: Show coordinates on an interactive map with markers and popups.
- Edit Mode: Direct input fields for precise coordinate entry.

Use Cases
- Store business locations and addresses
- Track user positions and preferences
- Create location-based content
- Build mapping and navigation features
- Geotag photos, events, or other content
